turkish_example_sentence: Sen yeterli deneyim sahip olmursan, bu zor işi yapamayacaksın.
english_example_sentence: If you don't have sufficient experience, you won't be able to do this difficult job.
russian_example_sentence: Если у тебя не будет достаточного опыта, ты не сможешь выполнить эту сложную работу.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen yeterli deneyim ______, bu zor işi yapamayacaksın.
